b'I\xe2\x80\x99m down to 500 shares of $BZH . My options are A) Hope for a pullback to buy more on the cheap. B) sell half before earnings and the other half after. C) Ride it all through earnings this month. I could change my mind but I\xe2\x80\x99m erring on the side of (C). May hold much longer'
